Recipe.Name: LccNetwork Features
Recipe.Description: A reciple to enable the features of the Lcc Network website.
Recipe.Author: Shaun Luttin

Feature.enable: Orchard.Alias, Orchard.Autoroute, TinyMce, Orchard.MediaLibrary, Orchard.ContentPicker, Orchard.PublishLater, Orchard.jQuery, Orchard.Widgets, Orchard.ContentTypes, Orchard.Scripting, Orchard.Scripting.Lightweight, PackagingServices, Orchard.Packaging, Orchard.Projections, Orchard.Fields, Orchard.OutputCache, Orchard.Taxonomies, LccNetwork, Highlightable, SectionNavigation, BigFont.Bootstrap.Components, TheThemeMachine
